import React from'react';import{Data}from'./Data';import"./testimonials.css";import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from'swiper/react';// Import Swiper styles
import'swiper/css';import'swiper/css/pagination';import{Pagination}from'swiper/modules';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Testimonials=function Testimonials(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"testimonial container section",id:"testimonials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"My Client Says"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section__subtitle",children:"Testimonial"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{className:"testimonial__container",loop:true,grabCursor:true,spaceBetween:24,pagination:{clickable:true},breakpoints:{576:{slidesPerView:2},768:{slidesPerView:2,spaceBetween:48}},modules:[Pagination],children:Data.map(function(_ref){var id=_ref.id,image=_ref.image,title=_ref.title,description=_ref.description;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SwiperSlide,{className:"testimonial__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,width:"300px",height:"300px",alt:"",className:"testimonial__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"testimonial__name",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonial__description",children:description})]},id);})})]});};export default Testimonials;
